requirements.summary: Update application title to Family Journey across all frontend assets
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab displays 'Family Journey' as the page title
The navigation header shows 'Family Journey' as the application name
All references to the previous title are replaced

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag to 'Family Journey' to reflect the new application name in the browser tab
Update the navigation header text from any existing title to 'Family Journey' to ensure consistent branding throughout the application
